# Tested hardware

This document describes testes hardware configurations.

## Synthesis

| Type | Manufacturer | Model | Virt. | IOMMU | Compatibility |
|--|--|--|--|--|--|
| Tablet | Durabook | R8 | Yes | Yes | 100% (1) |

(1) specific configuration is needed.

## Durabook R8

This tablet is know to work with the exclusion of the PCI bus `00:0d.0` which causes an hangout during the boot.
